desc: What are Eco Earth Laundry Detergent strips? A clever and eco friendly way of doing your laundry. highly concentrated, it'll get rid of even the toughest stains. Vegan & Cruelty Free & Zero Plastic Packaging

layout.text: Eco Earth Hero Strips are innovative laundry detergent strips which contain zero liquid. They can be dissolved in both hot or cold water and leave no mess, provide an incredibly thorough clean and leave your laundry free from stains and smelling fresh.
